title: Skin Concept: BUBBLE BATH BRAUM

embed.description: First attempt at designing a skin for League of Legends! Spent my entire day off working on this and touching it up, would have loved to detail abilities but I just don't have any more hours left i...

body:
Spent all day working on this!

I was envisioning his Q as a thrown Bar of Soap, his W increasing his suds coverage and soaping up an ally, E is pictured, R is pictured.

Taunts/jokes/dances involving him hopping in the tub to play with Rubber Poros, splashing about vigorously (backstroke, frontstroke, etc), stuff of the like.

Recall animation of him getting sucked down the drain on the tub, landing on base pad with a downpour of water on his head, and catching the tub as it falls after.

Comments/ideas welcome!

replies.body: He's holding an entire tub. I'm dead.

> [{quoted}](name=EvanThomas,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=HxLipns9,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2017-07-04T18:29:49.636+0000)
>
> He's holding an entire tub. I'm dead.

Sometimes Bath-time is unavoidable.

Today, we bathe as enemies. Tomorrow, we may bathe as allies.

My tub is my sword.

Sometimes, tub becomes smashing board.

If they insist on a bath, I will oblige them.

Sometimes, icy heart just needs warm bath.

The darker the water, the cleaner the body.
This is too good.

I would rather a tiny white towel instead of soap suds, but yeah I think this would make for a fine skin.

double entendre's are so great.
